answers.answer: hi, well there are number of causes for seizures like metabolic abnormalities e.g inborn error of metabolisms(genetic),uremic encephalopathy,kidney disorders etc.Blood examinations are done to rule out these disordersDiabetes leading to metabolic acidosis(ketoacidosis) may cause seizure.bye

question: My young cousin has been having seizures. Nothing on cat scan revealed. Did have a high amount of protien in urine. Can diabetes cause this?
title: Seizures, high protien in urine
